participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: cheerful and down-to-earth, with a love for simple pleasures and a deep appreciation for her local community.
participant_1.background: i work for our local supermarket. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i've a cat named spook. i've never been out of ohio.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: adventurous and resilient, always seeking new experiences and challenges, with a strong connection to nature.
participant_2.background: my parents taught me survival skills. i walk dogs for a living. i'm an avid kayaker. i'm also a graduate student.
